bill.summary: 3/1/1994--Introduced. Requires: (1) each federally-subsidized health care provider that provides health care services to an illegal alien to identify such person to the Immigration and Naturalization Service; (2) the Attorney General to give such alien deportation priority; and (3) withholding of specified U.S. assistance to such alien's home country to cover the cost of any unpaid health services.
